DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: Ewing sarcoma (ES) is a primary bone tumor initiated by an EWSR1-ETS gene fusion. To characterize the methylation of Ewing sarcoma, reduced representation bisulfite sequencing was performed.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: Ewing sarcoma (ES) is a primary bone tumor initiated by an EWSR1-ETS gene fusion. To characterize the methylation of Ewing sarcoma, reduced representation bisulfite sequencing was performed.
